patthana8.65:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana8.65:0.3_0: this is what belongs to the higher mind.
patthana8.65:1.1_0: Nor is a cause of bliss. ...
patthana8.65:2.1_0: Nor is a cause of bliss. ...
patthana8.65:3.1_0: Noble happiness arises dependent on the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, and is not the cause or condition for the three conditions. ...
